summary: This is a brief email chain from October 1, 2020, regarding scheduling a call to discuss an appeals question. The sender is an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York, and the recipient is addressed as 'M—', likely Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Tom
persons.context: The sender of the initial email, requesting a brief call to discuss an appeals question. He is an AUSA for the Southern District of New York.

connections.description: Tom, an AUSA, is requesting to speak with M— (likely Ghislaine Maxwell) regarding an appeals question, indicating a prosecutorial or legal communication.

events.title: Scheduling of call on appeals question
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney emails 'M—' to schedule a brief call later in the day to discuss an appeals question.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated October 1, 2020, concerning a call to discuss an appeals question.
The sender is an Assistant United States Attorney (AUSA) named Tom from the Southern District of New York.
The recipient is addressed as 'M—', and the attached filename 'Maxwell_Opposition_v3_.docx' strongly implies the recipient is Ghislaine Maxwell.
The communication indicates ongoing legal proceedings or appeals involving Maxwell in late 2020.
